mapper.sql: id, algorithm_name, algorithm_desc, max_numbers, min_numbers, support_language, support_os_system, algorithm_type, cost_mem, cost_cpu, cost_gpu, cost_bandwidth, run_time, public_flag, `status`, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select a.id as algorithmId, a.algorithm_name as algorithmName, a.algorithm_desc as algorithmDesc, a.algorithm_type as algorithmType from t_algorithm a where a.status = '1'
and a.algorithm_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{algorithmName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by a.algorithm_type asc

select a.id as algorithmId, a.algorithm_name as algorithmName, a.algorithm_desc as algorithmDesc, a.author as author, a.max_numbers as maxNumbers, a.min_numbers as minNumbers, a.support_language as supportLanguage, a.algorithm_type as algorithmType, a.cost_mem as costMem, a.cost_cpu as costCpu, a.cost_gpu as costGpu, a.cost_bandwidth as costBandwidth, a.run_time as runTime, b.edit_type as editType, b.calculate_contract_code as algorithmCode from t_algorithm a, t_algorithm_code b where 1=1 and a.status = '1' and b.status = '1' and a.id = b.algorithm_id and a.id = #{algorithmId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
